targets.query: select last(value) from merge(/openstack.cinder.status/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.keystone.status/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.glance.status/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.heat.status/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.neutron.status/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/openstack.nova.status/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/rabbitmq.status$/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/mysql.status$/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/apache.status$/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/haproxy.status$/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from /memcached.status$/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select min(value) from merge(/.*.openstack.nova.total_free_vcpus/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select max(value) from merge(/.*.openstack.nova.total_used_vcpus/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select min(value*1000000) from merge(/.*.openstack.nova.total_free_ram/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select max(value*1000000) from merge(/.*.openstack.nova.total_used_ram/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select min(value*1000000000) from merge(/.*.openstack.nova.total_free_disk/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select max(value*1000000000) from merge(/.*.openstack.nova.total_used_disk/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$controller.cpu.\d+.user/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$controller.cpu.\d+.idle/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$controller.cpu.\d+.interrupt/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$controller.cpu.\d+.nice/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$controller.cpu.\d+.system/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$controller.cpu.\d+.steal/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$controller.cpu.\d+.wait/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.memory.used" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.memory.buffered" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.memory.cached" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.memory.free" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc

targets.series: select last(100.0*avail.value/(used.value + free.value)) from "$server.fs.$mount.space.free" as free inner join "$server.fs.$mount.space.used" as used where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
targets.query: select last(100.0*free.value/(used.value + free.value)) from "$controller.fs.root.space.free" as free inner join "$controller.fs.root.space.used" as used where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from merge(/ceph.cluster-ceph.health/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc

select last((avail.value * 1.0) / (total.value) * 100) from "$controller.ceph.cluster-ceph.pool.total_avail_bytes" as avail inner join "$controller.ceph.cluster-ceph.pool.total_bytes" as total  where time > now() - 15m group by time(60) order asc
select sum(value) from merge(/$controller.ceph.cluster-ceph.pool.*.objects/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-ceph.osd.up/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from /$controller.ceph.cluster-ceph.osd.down/ where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
